response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you, estimated at $1,500,000. I am confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this unique item to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a significant saving compared to its market value and provides you with an exceptional chance to own something truly remarkable. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any additional information.", "product_price": 1200000}
